description: This file defines a utility class 'IntlInit' that ensures the 'intl' package has a default locale set for consistent date/time formatting, particularly useful in CI or headless environments.

classes.name: IntlInit
classes.description: A utility class with a static method to initialize the 'intl' package's default locale.

methods.name: ensureInitialized
methods.description: Sets the 'intl' package's default locale to a specified locale, defaulting to 'en_US' if none is provided.
